text: ‘num̆ba janayāṭa avavāda karanu. tavada viśvāsa kaḷavun vana ovunaṭa ovungē paramādhipati abiyasa sæbævinma sæbǣ peramuṇak æti bava śubhāraṁci danvanu’ yæyi niyōga karamin ovun aturin vū miniseku veta api dēva paṇiviḍa danvā siṭīma janayā va puduma karavannak vī da? niyata vaśayenma mohu pæhædili hūniyamkaruvaku yæyi dēva pratikṣēpakayō pævasuvōya
